In terms of timing, we expect the position to become clearer over the next 1–2 rounds as other families’ decisions settle. If the place becomes available to you under our priority order, we will contact you immediately.

- preferred start date window,
- any schedule constraints (days/hours), and
- best phone number/email for same-day confirmation.

Thank you again for your patience, and please do continue to keep other applications active until you have a confirmed offer.
